name: Braking News - Post Jam Version
description:
A game about trying to delivery newspapers, drifting, and utter carnage.

Steer with A and D, spin yourself out of sticky situations with Space. (you can change the direction of spin with A and D)

Shoot papers with the mouse!

Restart with Enter!

I hope you enjoy it! 

This is the post-jam version of the game as it exists currently (about 2 hours more on it since the jam) - I'm planning on adding a zombies mode too, so watch this space!

P.S. you can do donuts!
